#NEXUS 
begin sptree;
(sp1:4.0,(sp2:0.6,(sp3:0.3,sp4:0.3):0.3):3.4);
end;

begin genetrees;
(sp1:4.0,(sp2:1.1,(sp3:0.435,sp4:0.435):0.435):2.9);
(sp1:4.0,(sp2:1.266,(sp3:0.766,sp4:0.766):0.766):2.734);
(sp1:4.0,(sp3:1.266,(sp2:0.766,sp4:0.766):0.766):2.734);
(sp1:4.0,(sp4:1.266,(sp2:0.766,sp3:0.766):0.766):2.734);
end; 

begin traits;
set trait sp1 = 3.2
set trait sp2 = 1.5
set trait sp3 = 1.1
set trait sp4 = 0.9
end;
